data.title: Attorneys Archive
data.text:
Robert Tyson

Partner

A native of Staten Island, New York, Bob Tyson is the Strategic Managing Partner of the ﬁrm. Mr. Tyson is a trial lawyer and author of the #1 best-selling, first book written for the defense to limit exposure at trial, Nuclear Verdicts: Defending Justice for All…
